revision.text: Possibly: A dissertation on the civil government of the Hebrews, in which the true designs and nature of their government are explained, the justice, wisdom and goodness of the Mosaical Constitutions, are vindicated: in particular, from some late, unfair and false representations of them in the Moral Philosopher ..., by Moses Lowman. (London, Noon, 1745). http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/978047268
